<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Policy name="dc=amconfig^^EntitlementEval" createdby="uid=dsameuser" lastmodifiedby="uid=dsameuser" creationdate="1656319218213" lastmodifieddate="1656319218213" referralPolicy="false" active="true" >
<Rule name="delegation-rule5">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://dc=amconfig/sunEntitlementService/1.0/application/ws/1/entitlement/listener*" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="MODIFY" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Rule name="delegation-rule4">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://dc=amconfig/sunEntitlementService/1.0/application/ws/1/entitlement/entitlements" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="READ" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Rule name="delegation-rule3">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://dc=amconfig/sunEntitlementService/1.0/application/ws/1/entitlement/entitlement" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="READ" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Rule name="delegation-rule2">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://dc=amconfig/sunEntitlementService/1.0/application/ws/1/entitlement/decisions" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="READ" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Rule name="delegation-rule1">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://dc=amconfig/sunEntitlementService/1.0/application/ws/1/entitlement/decision" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="READ" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Subjects name="Subjects" description="">
<Subject name="AuthenticatedAgents" type="AuthenticatedAgents" includeType="inclusive">
</Subject>
</Subjects>
</Policy>
